title: If we could permanently delete unwanted memories, what's something you'd regret accidentally deleting? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a few moments in my life that were so terrible (to me personally, not something overall) that when I flashback on them I still cringe. Yet, I don’t entirely think I’d disown them, as they are a reminder to terrible times, and lessons learned.
I can`t think of any memories that I would want to permanently delete other than a couple relationships. I don`t know if this will help you or not, I hope so. Take care, Have a great life.
